title: Bulgaria Asylum Applications
description: Asylum Applications in Bulgaria increased to 2495 persons in September from 1895 persons in August of 2022. Asylum Applications in Bulgaria averaged 678.26 persons from 2008 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 3530 persons in October of 2015 and a record low of 25 persons in May of 2011. Asylum Application in this page refers to first time asylum applicants. Data is supplied to Trading Economics by the Eurostat, National Ministries of Interior and other official agencies.
author: EUROSTAT
